Articles.Content:
HELP! I can't access the game anymore.

I've already played 204 hours but for some reason  this box pops on my screen:

" Couldn''t switch to requested monitor resolution

Details:

Switch to resolution 154x0 failed, trying lower one. 

All resolution switches have failed

Screen: could not switch resolution (154x0 fs=0 hz=0)"

I have not done anything to try to modify or exchange monitors so I don't know why this is 

popping up and denying me access into my paid program.

Please help as no one else has been able to help me with this.

Thanks

Shakeel

Welcome to the forums! Sorry it's under such bad circumstances.

You could try going to your settings.cfg file and changing these lines:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1920
SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 1080
FULLSCREEN = True

Edited November 9, 2017 by Rocket In My Pocket
